package.name: pdflib
package.summary: Creating PDF on the fly with the PDFlib library
package.description:
This extension wraps the PDFlib programming library for processing PDF on the fly, created by Thomas Merz.
PDFlib is available under the PDFlib Lite License (http://www.pdflib.com/pdffiles/PDFlib-Lite-license.pdf) and for commercial licensing.

release.notes: Bugfixes: - PDF_get_parameter crashed when called with only 2 parameters. Enhancements: - added pdf_utf8_to_utf16() and pdf_utf16_to_utf8() API's. - included support for PDFlib4 again
